text: Oleg Viktorovich Seleznyov (, 22 July 1959 â€“ 6 October 2021) was a Russian politician. He was the member of the Federation Council of the Federal Assembly from 2017 until his death. Seleznyov died at a hospital in Krasnodar, Russia on 6 October 2021 from COVID-19, at the age of 62. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Russia Category:Members of the Federation Council (Russia)
title: Oleg Seleznyov
